title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 503.2 - Definitions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 503.2 - Definitions

State Regulations

Definitions. In addition to the definitions contained in
section 8-0105 of the State Environmental Quality Review Act and 6 NYCRR
617.2, the following definitions shall apply to this Part: (a) Authority means the New York State Energy

Research and Development Authority. (b) NYCRR means the Official Compilation of
the Codes, Rules and Regulations of the State of New York. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
503.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
